introTitle: Welcome to {appName}: Your Intelligent Chat Companion
introBody: Discover a new way to communicate with {appName}, your intelligent chat companion designed to make your conversations smarter, faster and more engaging.
aboutDescription:
Developed by Eng.Ahmed Kashkoush, {appName} is a cutting-edge chat application that leverages advanced AI technology to enhance your messaging experience. With Ai Chatter, simply input a message prompt and receive intelligent, contextually relevant responses generated by our sophisticated AI. Additionally, the app suggests future message prompts based on the generated responses, making your conversations flow effortlessly and naturally.

Explore the future of communication with Ai Chatter and enjoy seamless, engaging interactions like never before.
confirmToClearHistory: Are you sure you want to clear the chat history?
confirmToDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this message?
responseTimeout: Response process timeout. Please try again later.
